pkgmetadata.longdescription: Weighted Metrics and Performance Measures for Machine Learning // Provides weighted versions of several metrics and performance measures used in machine learning, including average unit deviances of the Bernoulli, Tweedie, Poisson, and Gamma distributions, see e.g. Ohlsson E. and Johansson B. (2015, ISBN: 978-3642107900). The package also contains a weighted version of generalized R-squared, see e.g. Cohen, Jacob. et al. (2002, ISBN: 978-0805822236). Furthermore, 'dplyr' chains are supported.
